frontmatter.title: Unreal Engine 5: A Leap in Quality
frontmatter.description: Although I wouldn’t call myself an avid gamer, I would say I’m a technology nerd and I just can’t help myself when I find out that Epic Games have announced the next iteration of their game engine. Unreal Engine 5.
frontmatter.author: William Neild
